title: Major bug with Anivia's Q on New SR, PLEASE fix!
body:
I'm reporting that Flash Frosts trajectory indicator pops up  and the circle indicator goes spastic all over the place if your mouse is moving over any steps or slants in the map. I.E. Entrances into river, steps leaving the base.
In middle lane, at the steps for the inhibitor turret for middle, it drops. When I say it drops, it literally gets smaller and appears to have dropped to multiple 3d layers down.
Video of it found here by me :
http://youtu.be/0zsVEBXb-7w

Edit 1 : I want to be clear about this. This is not just a visual issue, the stun is not being applied to enemy champions when the indicator has shifted. If using the quick cast feature, it still does this.

replies.body: Hey, thanks for this report!  Definitely a bug, easy to reproduce and clear.  I'll make sure this gets to the right people so we can try to get a fix for it

I did want to make sure you saw the edit to my post, I was typing it when you posted this so it was edited just seconds after you posted. Thanks the for quick response. Also, in your new sticky, it says you can see an example here but doesn't give a link for reference to the 'here'...
Update : since the small patch this week, none of flash frost is affecting any target in these areas.

There's another, long-standing bug with Anivia's Q that's been bothering me for many months, seemingly ever since I started playing her roughly a year ago.  

Occasionally, the visual particle will disappear, but the ability will still function normally and you can see when it chills enemies.  It happens once or twice in most of my games with her, and it seems to only happen in the early to early-mid game.

I have been noticing this more recently. I have tried to accurately reproduce it in a custom but I can't seem to. It usually happens for me when there are lots of minions and champs around that the projectile has to pass through. I'll try again later see what I can come up with.
